dataGroup.data: The compact HTB250 fits elegantly underneath your TV. The sound reproduced by the speaker and subwoofer is clear & powerful and will add enhanced realism to the pictures on your TV.
The compact HTB250 fits elegantly underneath your TV. The sound reproduced by the speaker and subwoofer is clear & powerful and will add enhanced realism to the pictures on your TV.
Stylish and compact fit with Panasonic TVs
Easy control TV and sound bar using HDMI
